deckInfo.name: Chinese Learning - My Good Brother v1::Level 3 - Complete Lines::Listening
deckInfo.description: Complete lyric lines from 'My Good Brother' - Listening focus

lyricLines.description: The opening lines about memories and singing for a friend

cards.back:
在你回憶的時刻

(zài nǐ huíyì de shíkè)

In your moments of memory

Opening line: 在 + 你 + 回憶的時刻

讓我為你唱首歌

(ràng wǒ wèi nǐ chàng shǒu gē)

Let me sing a song for you

Offering comfort: 讓我 + 為你 + 唱首歌
cards.translation: Let me sing a song for you

cards.back:
我的好兄弟

(wǒ de hǎo xiōngdì)

My good brother

Title phrase and term of endearment

心裡有苦你對我說

(xīnlǐ yǒu kǔ nǐ duì wǒ shuō)

If you have suffering in your heart, tell me

Invitation to share: 心裡有苦 + 你對我說
cards.translation: If you have suffering in your heart, tell me

lyricLines.description: Lines about walking the path of life together

cards.back:
前方大路

(qiánfāng dàlù)

The road ahead

Bridge phrase: Part of '前方大路一起走'

前方大路一起走

(qiánfāng dàlù yīqǐ zǒu)

Walk the road ahead together

Journey commitment: 前方大路 + 一起走

哪怕是河

(nǎpà shì hé)

Even if it's a river

Bridge phrase: Part of '哪怕是河也一起過'

也一起過

(yě yīqǐ guò)

we'll cross it together

Bridge phrase: Part of '哪怕是河也一起過'

哪怕是河也一起過

(nǎpà shì hé yě yīqǐ guò)

Even if it's a river, we'll cross it together

Determination: 哪怕是河 + 也一起過
cards.translation: Even if it's a river, we'll cross it together

cards.back:
苦點淚點有能算什麼

(kǔ diǎn lèi diǎn yǒu néng suàn shénme)

A little suffering and tears - what does it matter?

Dismissing hardship: 苦點淚點 + 有能算什麼
cards.translation: A little suffering and tears - what does it matter?

cards.back:
在你需要我

(zài nǐ xūyào wǒ)

When you need me

Bridge phrase: Part of '在你需要我的時候'

的時候

(de shíhou)

at the time

Bridge phrase: Part of '在你需要我的時候'

在你需要我的時候

(zài nǐ xūyào wǒ de shíhou)

When you need me

Time of need: 在你需要我 + 的時候

我來陪你

(wǒ lái péi nǐ)

I'll come to accompany you

Bridge phrase: Part of '我來陪你一起度過'

我來陪你一起度過

(wǒ lái péi nǐ yīqǐ dùguò)

I'll come to accompany you through it

Promise of support: 我來陪你 + 一起度過
cards.translation: I'll come to accompany you through it

lyricLines.description: Lines about life's ups and downs and staying strong

cards.back:
人生難得

(rénshēng nándé)

Life is rarely

Bridge phrase: Part of '人生難得起起落落'

起起落落

(qǐqǐ luòluò)

ups and downs

Bridge phrase: Part of '人生難得起起落落'

人生難得起起落落

(rénshēng nándé qǐqǐ luòluò)

Life rarely avoids ups and downs

Life reality: 人生難得 + 起起落落
cards.translation: Life rarely avoids ups and downs

cards.back:
還是要堅強的生活

(háishì yào jiānqiáng de shēnghuó)

We still need to live with strength

Perseverance: 還是要 + 堅強的生活
cards.translation: We still need to live with strength

lyricLines.description: Lines about the deep bonds of friendship

cards.back:
朋友的情義壓過天

(péngyǒu de qíngyì yā guò tiān)

Friendship's loyalty weighs more than heaven

Bridge phrase: Part of longer line about friendship
cards.translation: Friendship's loyalty weighs more than heaven

cards.back:
還高過的海

(hái gāo guò de hǎi)

and higher than the sea

Bridge phrase: Continuation of friendship comparison

那些歲月

(nàxiē suìyuè)

Those years

Bridge phrase: Part of '那些歲月我們一定會記得'

我們一定會記得

(wǒmen yīdìng huì jìde)

we will definitely remember

Bridge phrase: Part of '那些歲月我們一定會記得'

那些歲月我們一定會記得

(nàxiē suìyuè wǒmen yīdìng huì jìde)

We will definitely remember those years

Memory promise: 那些歲月 + 我們一定會記得
cards.chineseText: 那些歲月我們一定會記得
cards.translation: We will definitely remember those years

lyricLines.description: Poetic comparisons of friendship to wine and old songs

cards.back:
像一杯酒像一首老歌

(xiàng yī bēi jiǔ xiàng yī shǒu lǎo gē)

Like a glass of wine, like an old song

Double metaphor: 像一杯酒 + 像一首老歌
cards.translation: Like a glass of wine, like an old song
